DragIcons: Drag icons here to create your pattern:
DragColors: Drag colors here to create your pattern:
TutoGridWelcomeContent: Welcome in Xmas Lights activity. This activity will allow creation of nice blinking Christmas lights using Sugarizer icons and colors
TutoGridBoardContent: This is the board where lights are display, you could fully control what is display here and which animation is use
TutoGridTemplateButtonContent: Click here to choose one of sample Christmas lights. You will be able to fully customize it
TutoGridPlayButtonContent: Click here to stop or restart blinking
TutoGridSettingsButtonContent: This will open the edit view. In this view you will be able to edit icons and colors used
TutoGridSpeedButtonContent: Click here to make blinking faster or slower
TutoGridTextButtonContent: Click here to change text displayed and change text characteristics (color, style, size)
TutoGridZoomButtonContent: This menu let you change icons size in the board
TutoGridNetworkButtonContent: This button will share the activity so other users can then join and update your light
TutoDetailWelcomeContent: On this screen you will be able to customize icons and colors. To the left are tools to change icons, to the right are tools to change colors
TutoDetailDropIconContent: In this zone you can define the icons pattern use to draw your light. Drop and arrange here list of icons you want to use. Let this zone empty to use all icons
TutoDetailDragIconContent: Here are all icons you could use in your pattern. Drag and drop in the pattern, icons you want to use. The special Dice icon mean: choose randomly one icon
TutoDetailDeleteIconContent: Click here to remove all icons in the pattern
TutoDetailDropColorContent: In this zone you can define the colors pattern use to draw your light. Drop and arrange here list of colors you want to use. Let this zone empty to use all colors
TutoDetailDragColorContent: Here are all colors you could use in your pattern. Drag and drop in the pattern, colors you want to use. The special Dice icon mean: choose randomly one color
TutoDetailDeleteColorContent: Click here to remove all colors in the pattern
TutoDetailGridButtonContent: Click here to go back to the light screen to see change
